dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 5824 IH: To provide for continued operation of the Federal Aviation Administration in the event of a lapse in appropriation.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Van Drew introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Appropriations

form.official-title: To provide for continued operation of the Federal Aviation Administration in the event of a lapse in appropriation.

section.header: Continued operation of Federal Aviation Administration
section.text: In the case of a lapse in appropriations for the Federal Aviation Administration, there are appropriated such amounts as may be necessary for the operation of such Administration for the lesser ofâ€”

paragraph.text: the duration of the lapse in appropriation.
